channel.title: Npc drops
channel.description: How do I make npcs drop certain items

item.title: Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @negative101 negative101
item.description:
@negative101 wrote:

u have to goto item 2 in your server file and add something like u can search had and u might find his drops and just copy and paste and make a new one

Name it w/e u want but when u put the npc in the auto spplawn it has to b spelled the correct way u spelled it in item 2

Then comple and your done u just made a certain monster drop items
I and where it says
{6570,6570,6570…}; This is what it drops the item I’d and don’t put spaces before or after the comma then ur done and u can add any nov drops u want to

hope this helped[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2008, 10:53:19 pm[/size][hr]I and when u copy and paste the jad one make sure that u replace all the jad with what u put in autospawn

Where it says nov=npc

Soz for bad spelling I’m on my phone[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2008, 10:56:33 pm[/size][hr]Omg on the second line where it says had I ment to put jad

Stupid spelling correction thing on my phone
